name: Box Quest
description:
Box Quest is a Run and Gun platformer inspired by games such as Megaman X and Super Meat Boy.  Box Quest was a project for me to grow and strengthen my programming and level design skills. This project also taught me how to take a broad idea and really narrow it down into an achievable goal.  Box Quest took, 2 long semesters to create and went through many changes and variations along the way but I am proud with what I was able to create and am excited to continue creating from here on.

Best if played with a controller

If on keyboard, Press SPACE to start

SPACE to Jump

WASD to Move

B to Shoot

Check out more of Opaque Eye's 
https://soundcloud.com/opaque_eyes
